NAME.Nominative: 40 Virgin-Martyrs and Martyr Deacon Ammun, their instructor

INFO.Note: The Greek Synaxarion gives the names of the 40 Virgin-Martyrs as: Adamantine, Callirrhoe, Chariclia, Penelope, Clio, Thalia, Marianthe, Euterpe, Terpsichore, Urania, Cleonice, Sappho, Erato, Polyhymnia, Dodona, Athena, Troas, Cleopatra, Coralia, Callista, Theonoe, Theano, Aspasia, Polynice, Dione, Theophane, Erasmia, Hermenia, Aphrodite, Margaret, Antigone, Pandora, Chaido, Lampro, Moscho, Areboia, Theonymphe, Acribe, Melpomene, and Elpinice. Some of these are commonly used baptismal names in Greek practice.
